snippet.title: DUST 514: Fight Your Own War
snippet.description:
DUST 514® has arrived, and shooters will never be the same again. In this free-to-play, massively multiplayer first-person shooter from CCP Games, you become an immortal mercenary fighting for your own ambitions in the war-torn universe of New Eden, alongside the half-million pilots of EVE Online®! 

With endless customization and deep gameplay that rewards teamwork and vision, DUST 514 offers ever-changing FPS action and a constantly evolving challenge. Build an empire, wage war on a cosmic scale, and change the galaxy forever.

DUST 514: http://www.dust514.com
